Name: [Artifice] Burning Rose
Desc:
For {CReplaceCardParam:ProgressLeft,1,2} combats, Agent Anomaly Buildup Rate decreases by <color=#CF4029>80%</color>.
Once reconstructed, Attribute Anomaly DMG increases by <color=#2BAD00>60%</color>.
Desc2: A beautiful rose that can ignite and burn. Actually, it's just a fake flower with a fire starter in the stem.
